activities: Resource Development Company (RDC) provides a complete spectrum of learning solutions to the Oil and Gas, Chemical and Pharmaceutical process industries. We have the most extensive library of e-learning modules for addressing process manufacturing mandated, core competency and unit operations knowledge requirements along with the industries' first LMS designed to address the unique compliance information requirements of process plants. Our environment may contain programs that store and maintain the personal information of individuals employed by companies utilizing our service. The specific nature of the personal information is dictated by the requirements of the individual's employer in using this service.
eucountries: Belgium, France, Ireland, Netherlands, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-line, HR and manually processed data
recoursemech: Individuals are first encouraged to contact RDC directly with any concerns or complaints. If the initial resolution is not satisfactory, RDC will cooperate with Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) located in the European Union or their authorized representatives to reach a satisfactory resolution.
